requirements.title: Course Requirements
requirements.subtitle: What you need to succeed
items: 3-month commitment to the program
Laptop or desktop computer
Minimum $500 initial trading capital
Availability to travel to Tampa for in-person training
Basic understanding of financial markets (preferred)
Dedication to daily practice and learning

importantNotice.title: Remember:
importantNotice.description: We don't manage trading, only guidance and guided practice. Learn by doing with expert mentors and start investing with confidence!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.contact: Still have questions? Contact us at

questions.question: What is the course format?
questions.answer: 3 intensive days of in-person training in Tampa, FL or virtual with full access to all live sessions.

questions.question: What will I learn exactly?
questions.answer: Proven trading strategies, technical analysis, risk management, trading psychology, and how to operate in real markets with mentorship.

questions.question: Does it include real practice?
questions.answer: Yes, you'll have live trading sessions with expert guidance and guided practice in real markets.

questions.question: What modalities are available?
questions.answer: You can attend in-person in Tampa, FL or participate virtually with full access to all live sessions.

questions.question: What does the price include?
questions.answer: 3 days of intensive training, course materials, personalized mentoring, access to exclusive trader community, and participation certificate.

questions.question: Do I need prior experience?
questions.answer: No, the course is designed for both beginners and experienced traders who want to improve their results.

whatWeDont.title: What we DON'T do
items: We don't sell dreams of getting rich overnight
We don't promise unrealistic 500% monthly returns
We don't leave you alone with pre-recorded videos
We don't use obsolete or theoretical strategies
We don't hide the risks of trading

whatWeDo.title: What we DO
items: We teach proven strategies in real markets
We operate live so you can see the complete process
We accompany you daily for 2 months
We teach you professional risk management
We train disciplined and consistent traders

phase1.title: Your Strategic Foundation
phase1.subtitle: Solid fundamentals to trade with confidence

phase2.title: Intensive In-Person Training
phase2.subtitle: Intensive hands-on training with live trading sessions

phase3.title: Supervised Practice
phase3.subtitle: Apply your knowledge with professional guidance

day1.title: Day 1 - Strategy and real-time analysis
items: Introduction to daily market structure and behavior
Identifying trends, patterns and high probability entry points
Effective calculation of stop loss and take profit levels
Real case analysis and critical review of historical operations

day2.title: Day 2 - Mindset, psychology and advanced strategies
items: Psychology and winning mindset of successful traders
Techniques to control fear, greed and impatience
How to identify trends, resistance and key support levels
Advanced use of indicators and variables for precision trading

day3.title: Day 3 - Live practice and guided operations
items: Live trading session with mentor accompaniment
Practical application of learned strategies and techniques
Q&A session and personalized adjustments
Open session for questions and strategies

seo.title: Master Trading Course 2025 - Professional Trading Education
seo.description: Join our 3-month intensive trading program. Learn from professionals, trade live in Tampa, and get certified. Limited to 50 students.
seo.keywords: trading course, professional trading, Tampa trading workshop, trading certification, day trading education
